name: Subterranean (Immanent Death)
description:
Delve into the ancient mines, unearthing vast treasures and forgotten secrets.

This game was sort of inspired by every mining game I've ever played. Your goal is to simply dig as deep as you can and mine valuable ores, spending your earnings to upgrade your equipment.

How to Play

  • WASD/Arrow Keys = Move/Select/Point the cursor
  • Space = Jump
  • Enter/Z = Mine
  • Esc/P = Pause
  • Back = Exit

Special thanks to these beta testers:

  • ReptileOfUnknownOrigin
